channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 8 Best Prime Day Laptop Deals (2024)
item.description: From MacBooks to Chromebooks, these are the best Prime Day laptop deals from brands we know and love.

item.description: Some of the hottest styling gadgets are on sale for Big Deal Days—these are the WIRED Gear team’s favorites.
